title: Text Processing Utility
description:
Build a CLI tool that counts lines, words, and characters in files (like 'wc' command)

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] Accepts file paths as arguments and processes multiple files
- [ ] Provides word, line, and character counts with proper formatting
- [ ] Handles file not found and permission errors gracefully
- [ ] Supports reading from STDIN when no files specified

title: Curriculum: Mastering CLI Tool Development
description: This curriculum transforms developers into proficient CLI tool creators through hands-on projects. Starting with command-line fundamentals, learners progress through argument parsing, file operations, and advanced features like interactive interfaces and plugin systems. By the end, students will have built a portfolio of real-world CLI tools and understand the patterns that make command-line applications powerful, user-friendly, and maintainable. Perfect for developers who want to automate workflows, create developer tools, or build system utilities.

title: Phase 1: CLI Foundations & First Tool
description: Plant the seeds of CLI development by understanding command-line interfaces, exit codes, and building your first simple tool.
